metadata.title: CVE-2016-5115 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
The avcodec_decode_audio4 function in libavcodec in libavformat 57.34.103,as used in MPlayer, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) via a crafted mp3 file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5115` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavcodec-extra59 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavcodec59 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavdevice59 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavfilter-extra8 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavfilter8 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavformat-extra - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavformat-extra59 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavformat59 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libavutil57 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libpostproc56 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libswresample4 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
libswscale6 - 7:4.4-6ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.4-6ubuntu5').
